mainText:
Shock an despair...I am so sad for his family and friends who suffer a 
great loss.  Thanks to him, my 3 year old Chase has been mentally 
stimulated since 1 years old using an apple phone and enjoying simple 
applications.  He has brought such joy and ease to our everyday life.  
His brilliant insights and ability to transfer this to historic 
technological advancements in communication, will forever live on and 
impact the world.

Much love and courage to his family in this time of grief.

Stay strong.
author: Jill
